page.title: 19Law and Order
page.content: The local police station houses about one hundred staff.As with most areas of the country there is a special motorway unit for dealing with any incidents on the motorway itself.The town is not a particularly lawless place but spates of vandalism plague the town from time to time. The shopping prescinct has its own security staff but the police are called in if necessary. In recent years the running of a local marathon and suchlike events has meant a different kind of policing but again mainly to do with traffic.
